page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: IN NARBERTH THERE ARE A VARIETY OF JOBS.THERE IS ALSO SOME UNEMPLOYMENT.THERE ARE JOBS IN THE RETAIL TRADE AND IN TOURISM.THERE ARE SOME OFFICE WORKERS IN NARBERTH,IN ESTATE AGENTS,INSURANCE SERVICES,BUT IT IS A LIGHTLY POPULATED AREA(1072 PEOPLE IN NARBERTH TOWN.)SO WORK IS LIMITED.THE LARGEST EMPLOYES IS THE AGRICULTURAL INDUSTRY WITH MANY JOBS IN THE RELATED SUPPLY AREAS,FARMING CO-OPERATIVES SUPPLYING FEEDSTUFFS, FERTILIZERS,FENCING MATERIALS ETC. TOURISM MAKES A PART TIME/SEASONAL CONTRIBUTION TO THE JOBS AVAILABLE BUT FOR THE REMAINDER OF THE YEAR NARBERTH IS A QUIET COUNTRY TOWN SERVING THE NEEDS OF ITS AGRICUTURAL COMMUNITY.
